MTNZF.JO.summary: MTN Zakhele Futhi (RF) Limited operates as an investment company in South Africa. The company operates as the special purpose investment vehicle to effect MTN Group Limited's 2016 Broad Based Black Economic Empowerment transaction. It acquires and holds shares in MTN Group on behalf of the participating black public. The company was incorporated in 2016 and is based in Johannesburg, South Africa.
